amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute replaced the language of the bill with the text of the the "District of Columbia and United States Territories Circulating Quarter Dollar Program Act".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Castle amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Castle.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Castle amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Castle amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
